txt.en: 'You...you are [placeholder], are you not? The famous [placeholder]. I ran into Gandalf the Grey upon the plains not long ago, and he asked me to convey a message to you if I should see you.\n\n'He said he would be in Edoras shortly to check on things there. Perhaps you will catch him if you make haste!'
Húlac can be found in the town of Stoke in the Broadacres.\n\nYou should ride to Stoke and search for Húlac.

'Well met again, [placeholder]! I have heard of trouble in the Broadacres, but I must continue my search for Erkenbrand, Grimbold, and Elfhelm, for I can find no trace of them since the Fords.\n\n'Will you go to the Broadacres in my stead, and lend what aid you can? Search for Húlac in the town of Stoke -- that will be a good start.'
A scout has encountered Gandalf while riding in the Westemnet, and the wizard mentioned that he wishes to speak with you.
'Well met, friend. We have need for a [placeholder] such as you....'
Gandalf can be found near the main gate of Edoras.\n\nYou were informed that Gandalf wishes to speak with you. You should go to him at once.
